timeline.bodyText:
You might consider re-using the existing batch commands that we used for the batch conversion, to help simplify this batch. With that approach you'd work out which BAMs need to be converted up-front, run a batch, then remove the conditional logic here.
The existing code also does some validation. See SamtoolsBamToCram if interested.
